links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = binomial(n+7, 7)*A000984(n+7)/A000984(7), A000984: central binomial coefficients - from _Wolfdieter Lang_.a(n) = ((2*n+13)*(2*n+11)*(2*n+9)*(2*n+7)*(2*n+5)*(2*n+3)*(2*n+1)/135135) * Binomial(2*n, n). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
prog: (MAGMA) [&*[2*n+i: i in [1..13 by 2]]*Binomial(2*n, n)/135135: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
